website_summaries.verdict: With a special blend of herbs, vitamins, & minerals, 1 Body’s formula will give your brain a boost.
pros: This American-made formula is free of soy, gluten, and artificial fillers
Buyers report noticeable changes - such as decreased hair loss and greater energy - after a matter of weeks
Effective for a number of different people, from younger weightlifters to septuagenarians
cons: A few users have reported an allergic reaction
Check the label carefully for ingredients

customer_reviews.title: Wrong form if B12 🤦🏽‍♀️Stop false advertising!!!
customer_reviews.text: Clearly not Methylcobalamin B12 as Amazin’s label has posted on website. Falsely advertising!!!! This is one of the reasons it’s not working!!!! Wrong ingredients!!! We’re tired of having to write these reviews when all we want is what’s advertised!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dedicated Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking Thyroid Support for a little over a month now and have lost 15 pounds. I also just started taking Nature-throid with it. I have been struggling with hypothyroid for 5 years. My doctor put me on synthroid only and I could not lose weight. This product is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Merath

customer_reviews.title: Beware!  Wrong form of B-12!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it advertised methylcobalamin as the form of B12 but the label I have says cyanocobalamin. I've uploaded a picture to show. I contacted the company and they said they only use the methylated kind and it must be a printing error....That seems like a very odd explanation to me since if they only use methylcobalamin, why did they have the wrong label at all in the first place??? For those who can't take the kind with cyanide, I would beware and not take a chance. Other 1 star reviews going back a year have the same complaint...
customer_reviews.author: Inquisitive Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed B12 to synthetic form!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this supplement for years and recently looked at the ingredients again and realized they have SWITCHED B12 from the natural form to the SYNTHETIC form without ever changing the listing online or informing customers!!! This is dangerous to anyone with the MTHFR gene mutation!!! I'll never use this product again. Honestly I was put off by this company a few months ago when they changed the pill color and my mom and I got different answers as to why...quite troubling. Listen, if you don't mind the synthetic form of B12, switch brands! There are SEVERAL on Amazon that are MUCH cheaper with the exact same ingredients!!
customer_reviews.author: Franchesca W.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong form of B-12.
customer_reviews.text: The website and box show the methylated form of B-12, but the bottle shows a different B-12. For those of us with MTHFR, we can’t take this. Very misleading as far as the pictures online!
customer_reviews.author: casey

customer_reviews.title: Please read! This helped me in a major way!
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a dramatic change within several days. I workout as a bodybuilder, powerlifter and weightlifter, and runner,not to mention that I’m a personal trainer who trains 50+ hours a week. I was still experiencing bloating! So my body depletes of its nutrition very very quickly, so having a hypothyroid was causing serious fatigue, foggy brain, very depressed days, lack of motivation, hair falling out, waking up very tired even with a full nights sleep. AND NOW- oh my goodness! I woke up this morning feeling completely rested! Ready for the day. I can see my mental state lifting. My body is burning fat like it used to when i was in my early 30’s.
customer_reviews.author: Ireateta S.Wardlaw

customer_reviews.title: Misleading product description of B12 form.
customer_reviews.text: I am sad to leave my first product review ever for something that I had such high hopes for that proved so disappointing. The product description lists the B12 as the natural form, as does the box. When I received it today and took it out of the box, the bottle says it contains the cheap synthetic cyanide form of B12. This is not only misleading, but could be very harmful to some people. After going back and reading past reviews, I see that this has been commented on since 2017. This seems like a very long time to ignore this issue with out a correction having been made.
customer_reviews.author: m hndl

customer_reviews.title: Do not use if you have an autoimmune condition.
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple different autoimmune conditions and couldn’t figure out why certain supplements and vitamins made me so sick and nauseous. After taking this brand I found out why. This product line includes ashwagandha in their line. That is something that a lot of people with autoimmune conditions are actually extremely allergic or sensitive to. This may product may work for you; however, it didn’t for me and they wouldn’t give me a refund on the products I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Velena Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this supplement with paleo diet
customer_reviews.text: I have hypothyroidism for about 20 years. My thyroid issue makes me have fatigue, hair loss, anxiety, depression, brain fog etc. Since I've started to take Thyroid Support Supplement, I could notice drastic changes in my life. It has been helping me with all these symptoms. My doctor says my thyroid had improved 30% in the past 6 months. I highly recommend this supplement with paleo diet, exercises, and meditation. You will get better for sure, as I am so much better.
customer_reviews.author: silvia correa

customer_reviews.title: Dark green capsules!
customer_reviews.text: The pills were a dark green, not beige like the first order. Concerning!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: told me my thyroid was fine, but I knew better
customer_reviews.text: For 6 years I have been plagued with brain fog, fatigue, thinning hair, no energy, weight gain, etc. Two local Drs. told me my thyroid was fine, but I knew better. I have been taking Body 1 Thyroid Support for about 3 weeks, and the instant I took the first pill, my energy improved. I have lost weight, no longer depressed and irritable. Body 1 Thyroid has worked a miracle with my health, and I am so much happier!!!! THANK YOU BODY 1!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Betty Daigle

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I think this is probably an awesome product, but for me not so much. I have a lot of stomach issues including ulcers, not even taking that into consideration, I took these and the stomach issues began anew after having them controlled for quite a long time. I only took them for a week and did notice calmer moods and clearer thinking though. I wish I didn't have the stomach issues, because I really think this is a good product. If you have intestinal problems just be aware that this may aggravate them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great metabolism supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product ,I bought the first bottle and noticed how sharp my mind was, I also was less bloated and did not add weight despite no changes in my activities and diet. However, I noticed that the bloatiness and the tiredness and unexplained weight loss was creeping in soon after I had finished this product, I had to think back on what changed in my daily routine and then I remembered that I was on Thyroid support when things were better. I ordered a new one and have noticed a major change in my activities and also my weight fluctuations. This is an awesome product, very much worth the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: moimeme

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: I was having some signs of hypothyroidism - cold extremities, fatigue, unable to lose weight despite low calories, etc - and was looking into something to try. One sign people mentioned was low body temperature. Before purchasing the product I took a 5 day average of my temperature when waking up, it was 97.3 (avg over 5 days). After purchasing this product and taking the same temperature readings my new 5 day average is 98.3, including a 'normal' 98.6 reading today. Additionally I've went down about 2.5 lbs over the last ~8-10 days without changing my diet & have had significantly less issues with cold fingers/toes. Overall seems to be perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: It works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I started using 1 Body Thyroid Support about a year ago when I added several other beneficial supplements. In an effort to save money, I cut this one out. It took about 2 months to start losing hair and feel completely fatigued again. I am so grateful that I could easily add it back into my daily routine. I've been taking it again for about two months. I'm happy to report that my hair is health again and I have enough energy to make it through a day without taking a nap. Thank you for a great product that really makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!!! Started taking for hair loss after being told multiple times that my thyroid was fine. Began taking April 1, 2018. The difference isn’t ridiculously noticeable but it is noticeable. My hair has grown about 1/2 an inch since April 1, but I’m excited to see hair growing in spots it wasn’t before... I am happy I have found this product. They have other amazing products as well. I would definitely suggest trying these and see if it can help change your life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: This supplement has changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Your experience with Thyroid Support I was diagnosed with Hashimotos at age 6 and have been on Synthroid my whole life ( I am now 32 years old). This past year, however, I decided to go off my medication for the first time. I tried different supplements to replace my prescription medication, but was not completely satisfied with them. 1 Body Thyroid support has had me feeling better than I have in years. Very satisfied and have already recommended it to at least 15 people!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Matney

customer_reviews.title: Helps with way more than just energy levels!
customer_reviews.text: So after months and months of my hair falling out in crazy amounts, I started thinking about what could be causing this issue. Well then it hit me, duh my thyroid. So I researched and found this product. I have been taking it for almost a month and can say my hair is finally starting to grow back. My energy levels are at an all time high plus a huge bonus I have been able to start actually losing weight since I started this supplement. I would recommend to anyone that is looking for a more natural way to bring balance to your body.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Other reviews are correct, this is NOT the advertised form of B12
customer_reviews.text: Pretty annoyed that the product description AND the box it came in says that the B12 used is methylcobalamine which is the one that better absorbed and stored but the container I received says cyanocobalamin which is a synthetic form of B12. I have not tried the product yet as I'm uncertain on whether or not I even want to
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sick
customer_reviews.text: This product made me extremely sick. Gave it a second chance and had the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Jan B.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this supplement. I used to feel drained and tired all the time and I have more energy after taking this. I also have lost 15 pounds and don't get as hungry so it definitely boosted my metabolism as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: This works!  Feel better.
customer_reviews.text: It works! I've been sick with metal toxins (old dental fillings/crowns) & root canal infections, which are being extracted. But I was feeling exhausted and fatigue. Metal toxins effect red blood cell (air hunger), adrenal and thyroid (had mild low thryoid but got worst with metal toxins) Once I started taking these, I felt better and able to be more alert to work on good days. Slowly recovering...but still a battle with good and bad days from metal detoxing. These have help me feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Furry Friends Rescue

customer_reviews.title: Can’t trust the product
customer_reviews.text: I doubt the legitimacy of this company. There was a free bottle offer inside the one I bought in October. Since I liked the product I had requested the same for a free bottle and received one. When I opened the free bottle today It was way off in color than the one I bought. The bottle that I bought says made in USA, vegan friendly, Non gmo and tested by 3rd party. The free bottle don’t say any of this and just says assembled in USA. Not sure how to trust this product. Very disappointed. Please see my pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Guru

customer_reviews.title: Willing to keep taking but....
customer_reviews.text: Been taking this for over a month. No change in my weight watsoever. I am going to purchase DHEA and see if that will help. I am a plant based vegan. I eat really good but have plateaued. I have 20 more lbs to lose. I will buy one more bortle to see if it kicks in later. Update: tried havasu DHEA it gave me headaches & anxiety. Returning it too. Next I will try DIM....
customer_reviews.author: Larissa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!.... this stuff works! for the first time in my life I can live a normal life..no more brain fog, no depression or anxiaty or stress ... and I'm loosing weight even without trying.. 1lb a week steady, too many things going I can say enough....
customer_reviews.author: Ju Ice

customer_reviews.title: Takes off the edge
customer_reviews.text: My doctor refuses to treat me for thyroid related issues because I tend to fall just barely within the 'normal range,' but I have all the symptoms. I am on anti depressants and other supplements too, but this helped take the edge off the 'fog' and fatigue. I can exercise without feeling like a dead weight and have some control over cravings. I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it!
customer_reviews.text: At first this really made me feel good and full of energy! Two months later and I’m having heart palpitations.. I lost 23 pounds but my chest hurts and I can barely breathe..
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Hypo for almost 30yrs
customer_reviews.text: If you've been hypo for as long as me you may experience the body losing it's ability to have normal responses and issues build and become harder to battle. I am currently working with a hormone specialist that thinks outside the box and has been extremely helpful in maximizing meds and supplements to help. However I plateaued again and almost started going backwards. I found this thyroid supplement, the reviews were great and so I gave it a try. I haven't felt this normal in decades. Still need to take my other supplements and diet, but it's just really nice to not feel like nothing can be done.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Davis

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I developed hypothyroidism as a result of radiation cancer treatment I never had problems with weight or anything associated with the thyroid but since taking these supplements for 6 months my thyroid is getting back to normal and my weight is doing great. the Dr said i can stay on the supplements instead of the medicine if my levels stay normal. i plan on staying on these
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Schwartzkopf

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My doctors won't take me seriously when I tell them I'm overweight, exhausted. I have a ton of medical issues. When my thyroid came back elevated the doctors told me it wasn't over the limit of concern but I know my body and something is wrong. My neurologist told me a similar story about her daughter, with the same experience. She ended up going to a natural doctor who was able to stabilize her thyroid. I haven't been able to afford to see a doctor like that but these pills have greatly helped my life and I will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: the first couple of months I used this I could definitely tell a difference in the way I felt and I had more energy. This is why I kept ordering it. These past several months I have felt horrible. I just had my blood work done last week and my tsh levels were off the charts. I feel like it was doing nothing to help me. I’m not sure if the company changed the ingredients or what, but don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ena Shippen

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I don't care what anybody says, this product has helped me lose 5 lbs without trying. Goes to show that I've been complaining about my thyroid for years and my doctor said my results are always in the normal range? Apparently they're not because I feel so much better using this product. I recommend that anyone that is thinking about trying this product just try it. I'm only 5 days in and feel so much better. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Maria B

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: 1body Thyroid Support: I have hypothyroidism. I've been taking this for just over 2 weeks now, with 1body's Adrenal Support supplement. In that short time, I am losing weight; I have less brain fog; my memory and concentration are improving; I am finally getting my energy back, and it's balanced and sustained throughout the day; my mood is much better. I am finally feeling balanced internally and like I can tackle projects again! I feel human again!! I have tried many other supplements to support my thyroid; I never felt any results. This is a high-quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Langston

customer_reviews.title: Not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I'm finishing up my first bottle and have noticed that it's aggravating most of my Hashimoto's symptoms. About an hour after I take it my mood changes and I'm ready to burst into tears. I was very excited from all the great reviews, but it's definitely not for everyone. I gave it a shot, but it's making me feel hyperthyroid instead of helping.
customer_reviews.author: jmasey

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been very tired and fatigued for the past year. I have been diagnosed with low thyroid but not low enough for the Doctor to do anything about it. Since he won't help I thought to take matters into my own hands and try your product. It is really helping me feel like a person again. I feel like getting up in the morning and doing projects that have been left for a long time. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathizplace

customer_reviews.title: This product works, I have the blood work to prove it.
customer_reviews.text: So, my thyroid numbers had started to climb and the Dr wanted to put me on thyroid medication. I declined and started this supplement instead. 6 months after taking this supplement 1 in the morning and 1 at night, we tested my tsh levels again and they were back down in the normal range. I am a believer in this product and this company.
customer_reviews.author: Riesenszoo

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS STUFF!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had lab tests which show no issues, but both my mom and brother were diagnosed with Hashimoto's Disease. I decided to try something and after a few products I found this product and am AMAZED!! No more extreme loss of hair! Able to lose weight finally! Feel much more focused! AND JUST FEEL LIKE MYSELF AGAIN!! I will tell others about this amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: crimegirl

customer_reviews.title: After blood tests, my doctor cut my thyroid medicine ...
customer_reviews.text: After blood tests, my doctor cut my thyroid medicine in half. I started gaining weight and sleeping all afternoon again. After gaining 15 pounds, a friend suggested I try another Thyroid Boost product, which I did, with no results. I googled my condition and Thyroid Support was mentioned. I was impressed buy all the positive reviews on Amazon and ordered it. What a difference. I've been taking it for about 3 weeks and am already loosing weight and able to get into the evening with just a short afternoon nap. Believe me, that's a big improvement. Thank you Thyroid Support.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Results!
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with chronic fatigue and hair loss on my scalp for several years - I had a bald patch which was very obvious (and especially hard for a woman of my age). A friend suggested trying a thyroid supplement. I chose this one over another popular brand because of the combination of natural ingredients and lack of fillers (plus it was cheaper than the other brand) - In just a few weeks I have seen AMAZING results, including my hair growing back and increased energy. It's rare that I see such immediate and profound changes from a dietary supplement - I HIGHLY recommend this one to anyone who is struggling with hair loss, fatigue, or other thyroid-related issues.
customer_reviews.author: YogiMama

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it.
customer_reviews.text: This product almost put me in the hospital. My heart was racing the the point I almost passed out. I had to sit and focus on an object and my breathing to get through it. The heart palpitations lasted three days. Within 15 minutes my heart was racing with palpitations and that lasted until the next morning. I DO NOT recommend this product. This was one of the scariest things I have ever been through.
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA F.

customer_reviews.title: Helped to increase my clarity and focus, overall energy and my appetite have decreased
customer_reviews.text: I have been using together with turmeric to help with and inflammation that I had for the past 7 years. Have been taking this for 3 weeks now and have noticed a few things that I believe can be attributed to the use of this product. This Thyroid Support supplement has definitely helped to increase my clarity and focus, and overall energy and my appetite have decreased.I highly recommend this product, I haven't had any negative side effects at all and I love the way it has given me the extra boost that I need!
customer_reviews.author: I love Skincare

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss reversed.....
customer_reviews.text: I chose this product because it seemed to be the most natural and it is from a company within the USA. Fairly quickly after starting this supplement I noticed I had a bit more energy and mostly that I was not losing so much hair. I had been losing hair by the handfuls when washing and combing and now seem to just shed a few hairs. I am very pleased with this supplement and will continue to use it.
customer_reviews.author: cakes

customer_reviews.title: Caused significant anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Using two a day made my body feel great but gave me such terrible anxiety I stopped. Kept taking one a day until they ran out. Efficacy on the physical side wasn’t nearly as noticiable taking only 1 a day, but the anxiety from taking 2 a day wasn’t worth the trade off to me. Chose not to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Giving both physical and mental help! Seems to be working great.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be working very well for my thyroid issues. My mental and physical has improved since taking Thyroid Support. I am so glad I tried something different before adding in meds. I hate that once you're on meds doctors won't even listen or try to help you get off them. I plan to continue taking these. I have also recently ordered 1 Body's Brain Supplement for my husband as he is getting older and needs the extra focus at work. I look forward to receiving my free bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeananne

customer_reviews.title: Actually lost weight on these it's worth it to try them!
customer_reviews.text: I have Hashimoto's and my Endocrinologist tells me that my levels are normal, and until they're abnormal he can't do anything. My antibodies are high in my blood, and I have so many symptoms of an underactive thyroid that it's obviously effecting me. I have been doing a lot of research into this condition and have completely changed my diet around, but still couldn't lose weight no matter what I've tried. I came across thyroid support seen all of the good reviews, and decided to try them. I've been taking them for 20 days and have dropped 9lbs already. I love them!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and makes me feel better. It works so well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 41 year old guy with Hypothyroidism, and obstructive sleep apnea. I was initially skeptical about all the "glowing reviews" until, I decided to purchase the product,and use it. I suffer all the symptoms of hypothyroidism, even though my T4 and T3 levels are in the right range. This product really does give me more energy, and makes me feel better. It works so well, that I plan on re-ordering, before I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Sgbofav

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am using two 1 Body products - Adrenal Support and Thyroid Support. Since I started using both, I definitely feel better and some of my symptoms of stress and hypothyroid have definitely started going away. I was stunned this morning when I had a little glitch trying to order something from their website, and so I emailed Customer Service. In less than an hour I heard from two different people in Customer Service offering to help me. My problem was resolved and my expectations were exceeded. What a great company!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mer

customer_reviews.title: What does this do?
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several bottles of this and I just do not know what it is supposed to do , or if it really does anything. I'm going to my primary M.D. this week and I will ask id this really is a benefit as a thyroid supplement or if I'm just paying for some expensive urine. I'll let you know the verdict. And the first bottle I ordered were green capsules, the next were clear with a beige powder which strongly resembles a K3D2 supplement my husband takes. I often wonder if there are really any beneficial ingredients in these supplements.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jones

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Box states vitamin B Methylcobalamin Bottle states vitamin B Cyanocobalamin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seal broken on 2 bottles
customer_reviews.text: I did not get a chance to try this product since the seal was broken on both the original bottle and replacement bottle. The bottle comes in an outer cardboard box (that is not sealed closed) and has a plastic wrap around the outer lid. The plastic cellophane wrap was only partially on the bottle and the lid could easily be pulled off with the wrap still affixed. The inner most seal on the top of the container was already off and stuck inside the lid. I returned it for a replacement. The same exact thing was wrong with the replacement bottle. I would assume this is a quality control issue, or something else.
customer_reviews.author: Trysta

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I've been going through menopause for 7 years now and had hopes there might be some product that could help me with my symptoms. After trying many products I can conclude that 1 body brand Thyroid Support has begun to help. I have been taking the supplement for almost a month and have noticed more energy, not as many hot flashes, body aches have subsided and perhaps some weight loss. At this point, I feel the need to continue using this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry M.

customer_reviews.title: 15 years of thyroid disease and I finally feel better!
customer_reviews.text: I have Hoshimoto’s Disease but have never needed medication. I’d become accustomed to feeling tired, clouded, and moody because my thyroid is sluggish but not to the point of needing meds. I ordered this product and began taking it about a month ago and I can honestly say that there is a noticeable difference in my energy, mood, and number of headaches I have gotten. It took about 4 weeks to start noticing a difference but I definitely feel better! I actually just recommended this product to my sister who also has Hoshimoto’s. Please note, I also continued taking a daily magnesium supplement as I have for years since this does not contain magnesium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thyroid
customer_reviews.text: I am having serious problems with my thyroid; it has caused my speech to slur quite badly. It turns out that some speech nerves run through the thyroid. I also had a lump forming under my chin. Things seem to be considerably better. I see my doctor next week to see if my test results are better. I'm taking my doctor's pills as well as these vitamins. I hate to take two things at once but, I have one life to live. I have a gut feeling that these vitamins are doing a wonderful job.
customer_reviews.author: yobob

customer_reviews.title: Give it a few weeks and you will feel the difference
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this last year and took it for a few months and after a month I realize it was working and I had much more cognitive clarity and physical energy. I had to undergo surgery, so I was taken off all medications as well as told to stop Supplements. I never started back on this, and kind of forgot I even had it. Well a few weeks ago I found the bottle that I still had and started taking it again, and yes I can see again that it is working for me. So I am back to order more.
customer_reviews.author: Cameo C. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! Thyroid support is helping me lose stomach puffiness and gain energy and mental clarity. I'm remembering things I usually can't or struggle with. Also feeling much warmer and need much less sleep! I feel like I used to only feel with coffee without the jitters! It worked best for me to start on one capsule a day and work up to two :)
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Gingerich

customer_reviews.title: Unsure
customer_reviews.text: The first month I took this product I noticed a few of changes. I had an increase of energy, less PMS symptoms, changes in my appetite, sleeping better, and my skin wasn't as dry anymore. Once I switched to the 2nd bottle, I started experiencing terrible headaches and insomnia. Also, the pills in the 2nd bottle were darker in color. I did receive a message explaining why the color changed and there were no changes made to the formula. I stopped taking the pills and no longer experiencing headaches. Maybe there was a change to the formula, maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: okay_sure

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Hyperthyroidism in 2008, over the years, I have developed an enlarged thyroid. Having an enlarged thyroid causes tightness in the neck and hoarse voice. Since I have started taking 1 Body Thyroid support, my neck does not feel as tight and I have not noticed the hoarseness as much. Can not tell for sure yet if thyroid is shrinking, but I do know the discomfort is less than before. Thanks 1 Body
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hunt

customer_reviews.title: More energy
customer_reviews.text: Dr. gave up on me. Diagnosis was something was askew with my thyroid but no meds they tried made one iota of difference in my blood tests. Meanwhile, I was exhausted. Began taking this. Now I still nap daily, but my energy has improved 100%.
customer_reviews.author: MzJill

customer_reviews.title: Being able to see through the 'fog' helps with stress!
customer_reviews.text: I believe the best results lie in my overall response to things. Before taking, I was on edge but exhausted at the same time. Now that I have been taking this supplement for three weeks, I am able to think straight through the fog. It really helps with stress relief and control (especially during the current COVID crisis!). I am still exhausted, but for good reason. (2 kids at home while working remotely!)
customer_reviews.author: LAartsyfartsy

customer_reviews.title: The best product I have tried.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing .Since taking it I have noticed my hair is not falling out as much and that the hair on my eyebrows are no longer missing in certain areas, but growing normally now. You have GOT to try this product for yourself. You won't be disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: AmberRain

customer_reviews.title: Thyroid Health
customer_reviews.text: I showed this product to an endocrinologist and he stated that this formula has everything needed to keep my thyroid healthy. This is important to me as I had to be treated for hypothyroidism with prescription medication from 2010 til 2012. I regained my thyroid health under the supervision of my doctor by living a healthier lifestyle. I was able to gradually cut back on the meds until my thyroid was operating normally. I have been off of thyroid medication for 4yrs now. I take this supplement daily.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sue Roe

customer_reviews.title: Thyroid Support
customer_reviews.text: Well since I've been taking it I have more energy. I not sleepy and I can stay up throughout the day without having several cups of coffee. I am prescribed Levothyroxin by my doctor and I stopped taking it to see if I can see a difference with this product, surprisingly I feel the same as if I was taking my medication. This is a great product for those who don't want to go the prescription route for the rest of your life. Thanks, 1Body
customer_reviews.author: melanie

customer_reviews.title: Improvements
customer_reviews.text: I am starting to get a little more energy. I have been taking them for a few weeks. Hopefully with a little more time, I will continue to see more results. I am 65 Years old so that might ex[lain the slow progress.
customer_reviews.author: Memer

customer_reviews.title: Good so far!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect, so I kept my expectations low. I usually have trouble losing weight even though I eat a clean 1200 or less calories per day. After taking this product for 2 weeks, I was pleasantly surprised that I was down a half a pound. (This was after a weekend of eating out due to celebrations - I expected to have a gain) I will continue to take the product and see if I notice continued changes. No noticeable change in my energy as of yet. I started with 1 each morning to see how my body reacted and moved to 1 in the a.m. and 1 before bed after a week. No side effects.
customer_reviews.author: M E

customer_reviews.title: Doctor approved
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a serious thyroid problem and was prescribed NP Thyroid which caused severe side effects. So she decided to try Thyroid support. It has not solved the thyroid problem but side effects caused by Thyroid NP are gone and her thyroid function has improved marginally in the past month. We saw her Doctor today and she approved the use of Thyroid Support with addition of Tyrosine, Zinc, and Iodine. 1 Body also gave us a free bottle of Thyroid Support, which was very nice. We plan to continue to use Thyroid Support as long as the thyroid problem exists.
customer_reviews.author: Philip H. Ness

customer_reviews.title: Genuine results!
customer_reviews.text: First day was meh, maybe because i was getting used to it but until today this product has given me more energy, more stamina and more importantly a better mood! i do notice my weight is more manageable because there are days where i cant eat clean due to my job and other personal responsibilities. I will be taking this product for the rest of my life!
customer_reviews.author: Jose I Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Lost two pounds in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I've taken Synthroid for over 30 years for hypothyroidism. I'm 63 and rather steadily gain weight and I don't have an abundance of energy. I've taken the Thyroid Support and I've lost two pounds in two weeks which is better than zero pounds. My energy has increased. I'm sure hoping I see long term weight loss along with more energy.
customer_reviews.author: Sibyl

customer_reviews.title: NOT A SCAM
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I am a night shift nurse and even before switching to nights, I ALWAYS felt tired, regardless of how much I slept. I also have a long history of trouble using the bathroom regularly. After a week of using this product, I have was much more "regular" and felt so much more rested and alert. I am confident that how I feel is due to this product actually being effective and not just a placebo effect. I also got a free bottle after purchasing my first one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Has saved my life!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been struggling with trying to find something for my hypothyroidism. Got tired of docs so took it in my own hands. Came across thus, researched and gave it a try. Been using it almost two weeks again and feeling alive again!! Sleeping better, have energy again, less moody, starting to lose weight. This has been a life saver for me and truly grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Jay_me33

customer_reviews.title: Worth Trying!
customer_reviews.text: Although I was watching my calorie intake and exercising regularly, I wasn’t losing weight. I started Thyroid Support because a few years back my dr mentioned my thyroid was a bit slow, but not enough to be on meds. So I remembered that and thought I would try this and lost 2.6 lbs my first week and another 1.4 pounds my second week. I have had no bad side effects at all. I sleep normal, I actually feel very good.
customer_reviews.author: Us from Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Definite Overall Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical so started on one pill a day for the first week and then up'd it to two a day mid-morning. I am happy to say that it works! I've much more energy, not as foggy thoughts and even an improvement in my skin. I'm not sure why or how it works but after one bottle I'm feeling a definite improvement overall. I'll be ordering my next bottle soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Hayes

customer_reviews.title: My body did not agree.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this supplement but it just did not sit well with my system. I took these as directed and ended up having a racing heart, sleeplessness, diarrhea and a lasting metallic taste in my mouth. I stopped for a time and tried again only to have the same symptoms return. Down the toilet they go. I was disappointed they didn't work but hope they do for others. I am going to try one similar but without iodine. Fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: MamaO'4

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful supplement!
customer_reviews.text: Saying these pills are life changing might be a bit over the top, but they really have made a noticeable improvement. I am more focused with much less brain fog, have more energy, and sleep better. Maybe it is placebo. Who the heck knows, but even if it is, I will continue to take these pills for the foreseeable future, and highly recommend these if you are diagnosed with Hypothyroidism. Even if you have not been, if you feel like your brain is a bit foggy, and need more energy, these are worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it works naturally
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to get to the doctor to see why my energy level are low. I mean low where you are conference calls and want to pass out. Or standing and your eyes get heavy. Since i was unable to get to the doctor do to the covid, and have my thyroid levels check I purchase this product, because of the ingredients. Needless to say after about a week or so I have more natural energy and better quality of sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Archie

customer_reviews.title: Rx dosage reduced
customer_reviews.text: In a little over a year on Thyroid Support, my Levothyroxin (generic of Synthroid) prescription dosage has been reduced from 125 to 50. I have no way of being sure this supplement is responsible, but I also have no other lifestyle changes which I can credit for this. BTW, I only take 1/2 the recommended dose of the Thyroid Support because of the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: The only thing that beats my Hashimoto’s fatigue
customer_reviews.text: This is my second review for this product. Are used it consistently for two months, and raved about it: more energy, less digestive problems, etc. then I let myself run out, and spent weeks battling digestive issues and extreme fatigue day after day. My fatigued brain finally made the connection, and I re-ordered. I started using it again yesterday, and today is the first day in weeks that I haven’t crawled straight into bed after coming home from my job in a kindergarten classroom! I realize it’s early to state that this is a lasting benefit, but based on my prior experience, I think I am a customer for life. Thank you for marketing this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix 2006

customer_reviews.title: Tried This For 30 Days and Just Ordered My Second Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I have just ordered my second bottle of Thyroid Support. I bought this product in hopes that it would help me. I have been experiencing zero energy, just feeling lethargic and slow. Fogging thinking, stubborn weight gain, tired all the time, all miserable symptoms to experience. After a month of using 1 Body Thyroid Support, I have noticed a huge improvement in my energy levels. I now have more clarity and focus. I have the energy to want to exercise. I added this to my monthly deliveries, as I don't want to run out. This product is a great way to feel better naturally. I am enjoying a better quality of life now because of it.
customer_reviews.author: RascalCate

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I was having night sweats and I could feel blood coursing through my legs too much. I was also exhausted. I haven't eaten regular salt in many years (I'm in love with sea salt) so I figured I'd give this a try before making an appointment with the doctor. It worked. I got some energy back and I felt much better after two days. Doctor looked over the label about two weeks later and gave the okay.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Inner and outer seal on the bottle
customer_reviews.text: When I received my shipment the outer seal was not in place and bottle was either already opened or the seal was misfit, not sure. Then when I opened the bottle there was no safety seal. I purchased the Adrenal Support along with this and that bottle had the seals. I tried calling their support line twice which was actually some kind of call center who took my number and no one ever called me back. I am VERY disappointed in my experience after having some very high hopes. No customer service whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: LISA HANFT

customer_reviews.title: Helps with afternoon energy slump
customer_reviews.text: I have hypothyroidism and was interested in trying this to supplement my prescription medications to see if it would help with improved energy. At first, I took the thyroid support per the directions on the bottle - one in the morning and a second in the evening. Then I received an e-mail from the seller with different directions - one in the morning and a second in the afternoon, so I changed my schedule to that. After changing my second pill to the afternoons, I have noticed a big difference in how I feel in the afternoons now - I do not have the mid to late afternoon energy slump and am able to stay active until bedtime.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R

customer_reviews.title: They changed the capsule, bad after taste.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these when they were in the white/ off white capsules. The second time I reorder them there in a dark green/blue capsules. About after a min. of taking one they open up before there supposed to in the stomach/ throat and have a burning yucky taste to them. Don't know if I'll reorder from this company. Other than that I like them, seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Feeling a change....**Update**Feb 18,2020
customer_reviews.text: Nov 27- Dec 9, 2019...Just 11 days in, feeling a spark.. brain fog dissipating.. energy levels about the same though, lost an inch or 2.. Waiting to see more improvement in the coming weeks. FEB 17, 2020 **Update**... Much better now.. must admit I’ve added ginger tea w/ginger root.. metabolism, mood and energy is better.. I’d call it a combination of things.. Fog is completely gone.. as the ginger root vanquishes inflammation.. See Ginger Root benefits, astounding.. good luck! Hypothyroidism is consistent, sufferers must likewise...
customer_reviews.author: jjenks

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I feel more energized an have been sleeping better. I have also lost 10Lbs. While taking thyroid support. I started my second bottle today and will keep updating my review as I continue taking this supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking The Thyroid Support for a while now and it has completely change my life. I have a nodule on the right side of my thyroid, my doctor chose not to put me on any medication for it. I was sent for an ultrasound and Biopsy. I struggled with weight gain and no energy to do anything. This product has been a life changer. If you are on the fence about this product...give it a try...you won't be sorry. I also recommend taking the Adrenal Support along with it. The two of them work excellent together.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa

customer_reviews.title: Since taking Thyroid Support I have had a blast of ...
customer_reviews.text: Since taking Thyroid Support I have had a blast of energy daily. I can not imagine life without it. I have the symptoms of a sluggish thyroid, but have not been diagnosed. I am now able to workout daily. I will be ordering again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough about this product. My recent blood work confirmed what I had though, my thyroid has slowed! So I purchased this product and this first dose had me sweating again, this was huge as I haven't seen any sweat at the gym for months!! I feel much better after taking it for 4 days now, I take one in the morning and one at night with dinner. I have not seen any effects on my sleep, but this one is now on auto-ship and I will update results after blood work in 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Adam

customer_reviews.title: Improved energy and my hair stopped falling out
customer_reviews.text: I was desperate when I turned to this product and I am so thankful I found it. Within 2 weeks of taking this product, I notice an increase in my energy levels. Now, over 2 months in, my hair has stopped falling out and is actually starting to thicken. Unfortunately, I have not experienced weight loss while taking this product but I am no longer rapidly gaining like I was when my thyroid function was declining. If you've done your research and think it sounds right for you, I can't recommend it highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Amber P.

customer_reviews.title: I love this product- my thinking has improved
customer_reviews.text: I love this product- my thinking has improved, energy levels is up, sleep much better & experienced shedding a few pounds of weight too- no exercising...so my metabolism is slowing improving as well. I ordered my next bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Teach2Me

customer_reviews.title: Not sure that it's helping thyroid, but possibly replaces lacking vitamins
customer_reviews.text: I really can't tell if it's helping a thyroid issue because I am not positive that I had a thyroid issue to begin with. I had decided that I would try it for another month either way because I think it does help to replace vitamins that I lack in my diet and when I stopped taking it for a few days I had really bad headaches. I'm not sure what caused the headaches but assumed that it could be a vitamin that I was getting from this supplement and then wasn't because I quit taking it. Either way I think it helps give me vitamins even if it may or may not actually help my thyroid.
customer_reviews.author: Rc

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this and a few days later I noticed that I didn't need to take a nap in the middle of the day. My energy increased and I believe it is regulating my hormones as well. I would suggest starting with one capsule a day then move to one in the morning and one at night. As long as the quality continues to be good, and I can see a difference in how I feel, then I will continue to be a customer. Just ordered the supplement for adrenal fatigue and hoping I that will increase the benefits.
customer_reviews.author: Darla - TX

customer_reviews.title: ... a blood test showed my thyroid was not working like it used to
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after a blood test showed my thyroid was not working like it used to. I am reluctant to take prescription medications because of the many possible negative side effects. After reading about Thryroid Support I thought I would give this a try before giving in to my doctor's request that I start taking a thyroid prescription. I am going to take it another couple of months and then have another blood test. The ingredients in this brand by 1Body are all recommended when I researched natural fixes for thyroids. I am hoping for the best!
customer_reviews.author: valerie ashley

customer_reviews.title: I have recommended to friends and I plan to continue taking Thyroid ...
customer_reviews.text: About a week after taking Thyroid Support at half the dose I began to feel more energized and my stomach issues started to elevate. After one week I began to take the full dose, I noticed that I began to lose weight. I have lost a total of 5 lbs, and I am hoping to lose another 5 lbs. I have IBS and Thyroid Support has helped me so much. I have recommended to friends and I plan to continue taking Thyroid Support. Thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Crociata

customer_reviews.title: Curb your appetite
customer_reviews.text: I was diagnosed with Hashimoto and had severe depression, muscle weakness, cold intolerance, yawning every 15 seconds, lack of energy and many more symptoms. I bought this product hoping I will have the same positive experience like the other people shared. Unfortunately I didn’t feel any improvement during the time I used the supplement. The only change I saw was suppressing my appetite which is why I’m giving it 3 stars. I will give it a try again when I’m in remission. It might be more beneficial then than now!
customer_reviews.author: Viktoriya Shilev

customer_reviews.title: There is no magic cure out there, but this product has actually improved my quality of life.
customer_reviews.text: I have an overall better feeling of wellness. My mood swings have been less frequent and less drastic. Even if I don't get quite as much sleep as I should, I still feel great during the day and don't get bogged down when things don't go exactly how I planned them. This product did not fix all my problems, but it has greatly improved my symptoms of hypothyroidism, including mood swings, irritability, constant fatigue, digestive issues, brain fog, and always feeling cold. I plan to take this supplement for as long as 1 Body keeps making it. It has legitimately changed my life, and my loved ones can actually tell that I feel much better.
customer_reviews.author: dubdude88

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I lost 5 lbs in the first week I was taking it and it keeps me energized without the jitters. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Montesino

customer_reviews.title: Hair loss is going
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these together with the Adrenal support, and I love these, its light and day now. My zombie like state is gone, my energy is back and hair loss and itchy scalp is gone down a lot. I will continue until I have my full head of hair back. Its just been three weeks only.
customer_reviews.author: Irving123

customer_reviews.title: I have found help with weight gain after menopause
customer_reviews.text: I have had the hardest time losing weight after menopause. I just kept gaining even with a healthy diet and exercise. After taking this product, I am happy to say I am on my way to my normal weight and I am feeling great and energized.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Most doctors don't want to recommend any type of vitamins or homeopathic therapy for diseases
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product due to the high reviews. I have Hashimoto's disease and wanted to find a product that will preserve the remaining thyroid function that I have. Most doctors don't want to recommend any type of vitamins or homeopathic therapy for diseases, and I am more interested in non-pharmaceutical treatment. This is why I chose this product. I don't think I have been taking it long enough for the full effects; however, I do notice less brain fog. I have been taking it once a day instead of twice a day, because one of the reviews recommended this (I don't want it to affect the insomnia that I deal with).
customer_reviews.author: Shelbot

customer_reviews.title: It's much better than my old prescription.
customer_reviews.text: I have been off my doctor prescribed thyroid for almost 2 years now trying other things. I have found a few to be good but this Thyroid Support Supplement works the best for me and I can sleep at night too. I am very glad I tried it and will continue with it.
customer_reviews.author: seehere

customer_reviews.title: Great Product--A lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as well as the Adrenal Support as I was looking for a natural supplement to help with my fatigue, mood swings, energy loss, etc. I have been taking both supplements for 10 days and can tell you the difference in my overall physical and mental health is incredible. I have started to regain my energy levels and no longer have those mood swings. I highly recommend this product and I will continue using it as part of my daily regiment. When I say this product is a life saver I do mean it. I'm starting to feel like "me" again. thank you thank you thank you
customer_reviews.author: Cher

product_meta.title: Thyroid Support Supplement with Iodine - Metabolism, Energy & Focus Formula - Vegetarian & Non-GMO - Vitamin B12 Complex, Zinc, Selenium, Ashwagandha, Copper, Coleus Forskohlii & More 30 Day Supply
feature_bullets: SUPPORT HEALTHY THYROID HORMONE FUNCTION - Support your metabolism & ensure your thyroid hormone stays at an optimal level with our powerful thyroid complex
INCREASE ENERGY LEVELS - A healthy thyroid is a happy thyroid, which means you will wake up more rested & have more energy throughout the day
BOOST FOCUS & CLARITY - Improving thyroid function is shown to boost concentration and improve your memory mood & finally clear out the 'brain fog'

ENCOURAGE HEALTHY WEIGHT LOSS - Improving thyroid function can assist with weight loss when you’re eating the proper diet and getting regular exercise. Complex includes all natural ashwagandha root, magnesium, bladderwrack, molybdenum, cayenne pepper, schisandra, plus more
NON-GMO & VEGETARIAN FRIENDLY - Thyroid Support is manufactured in the USA at a cGMP certified facility with NO wheat, gluten, soy, milk, egg, fish, or tree nuts. Easy-to-swallow vegetarian capsules
